Wesley Houck
============

**Email Contact:**
[whouck@wolfforthtx.us](mailto:whouck@wolfforthtx.us)
May 2024 - May 2026

Wesley Houck moved to Wolfforth in 2022, moving here after a 4 month search with his wife to find the ideal place to raise their family.  They chose Wolfforth.  Born in Marshall, TX and raised in the Pacific Northwest, where Wes built businesses in custom home building, business consulting, and financing.

Upon graduating High School, Wes attending a one year Bible School before attending Multnomah University obtaining a Bachelors in Science in Biblical Studies, Theological Studies with a minor in Education, Business, and Psychology.  He also attended Western Baptist Seminary studying Christian Counseling and volunteered at a local drug rehab facility counseling incarcerated drug offenders.

Wes was sworn onto the City Council May 20th, 2024 to begin his first term as Council Member, Place 2.  Wes is most excited about the growth, the schools, and potential that Wolfforth has.  He aims to help to preserve that which made Wolfforth unique while also looking ahead, Wes believes that balancing both of these is key in shaping a long-term vision for Wolfforth, ensuring a future Wolfforth that is the envy of Texas.
